grailsApplication

log

org.apache.log4j.Logger log

ports

java.lang.Object ports
For setting the ports via a getter. This is usually only used in testing so that you can set the ports to be the randomly-generated port number which is set by the UnboundID InMemoryDirectoryServer. Otherwise, this is set via the config param {@ucic.ldap.ports}.

serverSet

com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.RoundRobinServerSet serverSet

connection

java.lang.Object connection()
Get a connection from the serverSet and then bind. Right now it assumes it is going to connect and then it just binds. This should really throw an exception...
Returns:
LDAPConnection the authenticated LDAPConnection

createFilter

java.lang.Object createFilter(java.lang.String filterString)
Tries to create an LDAPFilter from the passed in string.
Parameters:
filterString - String to be converted into an LDAPFilter.
Returns:
ldap filter.

find

java.lang.Object find(java.lang.String baseDn, java.util.Map args)
Performs a find based on the passed in baseDn and args and returns the first entry found. If no entry is found, it returns null.
Parameters:
baseDN - The base DN to use in the search.
args - The Map of key:value pairs which will be turned into an AND filter.
Returns:
A LdapServiceEntry, which is the first result of the resulting search.

findAll

java.lang.Object findAll(java.lang.String baseDn, java.util.Map args)
Performs a find based on the passed in baseDn and args and returns a List of all of the results.
Parameters:
baseDN - The base DN to use in the search.
args - The Map of key:value pairs which will be turned into an AND filter.
Returns:
List of LdapServiceEntry objects.

findAllUsingFilter

java.lang.Object findAllUsingFilter(java.lang.String baseDn, LDAPFilter filter)
Performs a find based on the passed in baseDn and filter and returns a List of all of the results.
Parameters:
baseDN - The base DN to use in the search.
filter - The com.unboundid.ldap.sdk.Filter to use in the search request
Returns:
List of LdapServiceEntry objects.

methodMissing

java.lang.Object methodMissing(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object args)
Finds a person in LDAP given the passed in dn. It returns the first person that is returned if more than one person is returned. It does this because no two people should have the same EPPN.
Parameters:
dn - - the DN to use for searching
Returns:
SearchResultEntry - the person, or null if no one was found

search

private java.util.List search(java.lang.String base, java.lang.String attribute, java.lang.String value)
Returns a new List with the results of of the search. Returns an empty LinkedList if any exceptions are thrown. Note: The search scope is SearchScope.SUBORDINATE_SUBTREE.
Parameters:
attribute - - attribute to search for
value - - the value of attribute
base - - the search base
Returns:
List - a List of SearchResultEntry objects

searchUsingFilter

private java.util.List searchUsingFilter(java.lang.String base, java.lang.String filter)

withinDates

private boolean withinDates(java.util.Date start, java.util.Date expires)
Determines if today is between the start and expires. It first checks to make sure that start and expires are not null.
Parameters:
start - - the start date
expires - - the expires date
Returns:
boolean - true if start and expires are not null and today is between start and expires, and false otherwise.
